content.en: Algorithmic Education: Algorithms play a significant role in various aspects of education, according to a recent analysis of scientific abstracts. Learning analytics, powered by algorithms, are used to support the learning process and personalize learning experiences. However, there are concerns about the ownership of educational data analyses and the need to adapt algorithms for non-expert users. Overall, algorithms are transforming education and shaping our understanding and practices of learning in the digital era.
content.da: Algoritmisk uddannelse: Algoritmer spiller en væsentlig rolle i forskellige aspekter af uddannelse, ifølge en nylig analyse af videnskabelige abstracts. Læringsanalyser, drevet af algoritmer, anvendes til at understøtte læringsprocessen og personliggøre læringsoplevelser. Der er dog bekymringer omkring ejerskabet af uddannelsesmæssige dataanalyser og behovet for at tilpasse algoritmer til ikke-ekspertbrugere. Overordnet set forandrer algoritmer uddannelse og former vores forståelse og praksis af læring i den digitale æra.
